summary: Two veterans of the Bosnian War, one American, one Serbian, find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.
cast: Robert De Niro|John Travolta|Milo Ventimiglia|Elizabeth Olin|Diana Lyubenova|Kalin Sarmenov|Stefan Shterev|Joseph Oliveira
keywords: shot in the back of one's head|bosnian war|shrapnel|execution|revenge
title: Caza humana
